New Records: Shaheen Shah Afridi became the fastest to reach 100 ODI wickets for quick bowlers
Key Match Events: Shaheen Shah Afridi dismissed Mushfiqur Rahim and Najmul Hossain Shanto in the first over
Fakhar Zaman and Abdullah Shafique formed a 128-run partnership for the first wicket
Usama Mir struggled, especially against Mahmudullah
Afridi dismissed Mahmudullah and Shakib Al Hasan with key deliveries
Mohammad Wasim cleaned up the tail, dismissing Mehidy Hasan Miraz, Taskin Ahmed, and Mustafizur Rahman
Fakhar Zaman and Abdullah Shafique scored a total of 162 runs in 15.2 overs
Pakistan won by 7 wickets with 105 balls remaining
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan lifted their position to No. 5 on the points table
Pakistan's confidence and net run-rate received a boost
Bangladesh are officially out of the tournament
Pakistan's late charge in the tournament showed signs of revival
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh's best passage of play was a 79-run partnership between Litton Das and Mahmudullah
Fakhar Zaman's dismissal of Shakib Al Hasan with a difficult delivery
Abdullah Shafique scored his half-century in the same over as Fakhar's
Mehidy Hasan Miraz conceded a six over cow corner to Iftikhar Ahmed
Others: Bangladesh's top six made different mistakes in every game
Pakistan's rotation of bowlers by Babar Azam was praised
